# Propensity Score


## Boosting

```{r include=FALSE, warnings=FALSE}
vars_propensity <- c(vars_, 'Code of the patient')
data_propensity <- data_ %>% 
  .[, .SD, .SDcols = vars_propensity] %>% 
  na.omit

data_propensity_anonym <- data_propensity %>% 
  .[, -'Code of the patient'] 

propensity_model <- data_propensity_anonym %>% 
  as.data.table %>% 
  train_model(treatment_name, models='boosting', tuneLength = tuneLength)
data_propensity_anonym %<>% cross_fitting(
  propensity_model, treatment_name, treatment_vals[1]
)
data_propensity[, propensity := data_propensity_anonym[, propensity]]
```

```{r}
write.csv(data_propensity, "liv_l4_l5_review/datos_utilizados.csv", quote = FALSE, row.names = FALSE)
```


```{r}
propensities <- data_propensity %>% 
  .[, .(propensity=propensity, treatment = get(treatment_name))]
auc_result <- auc(roc(propensities$treatment, propensities$propensity))
ggplot(propensities, aes(propensity, fill=treatment, color=treatment)) +
  geom_density(alpha = 0.1) +
  xlim(c(0, 1)) +
  ggtitle('Propensity of being {treatment_vals[1]}\nAUC: {auc_result}' %>% f)
```


```{r include=TRUE}
data_propensity %<>% .[propensity >= propensity_threshold] 
```

Propensity threshold `r propensity_threshold`

# Average Treatment Effects

```{r include=FALSE, warnings=FALSE}
vars_outcome_ <- c(treatment_name, 'propensity')
results <- list()
for( outcome in outcomes ){
  vars_outcome <- c(vars_outcome_, outcome)

  data_outcomes <- data_ %>% 
    merge(data_propensity[, .(`Code of the patient`, propensity)], all=FALSE) 
  
  change_ <- FALSE
  if(!is.na(as.numeric(substr(outcome, 1, 1)))){
    change_ <- TRUE
    outcome_preop <- substr(outcome, 5, nchar(outcome))
    data_outcomes[, c(outcome) := get(outcome) - get(outcome_preop)]
  }
  
  data_outcomes %<>% 
    .[, .SD, .SDcols = vars_outcome] %>% 
    na.omit
  
  data_1 <- data_outcomes %>% 
    .[get(treatment_name)==treatment_vals[1]] %>% 
    .[, .SD, .SDcols = vars_outcome] %>% 
    .[, c(treatment_name) := NULL] %>% 
    na.omit
  
  data_2 <- data_outcomes %>% 
    .[get(treatment_name)==treatment_vals[2]] %>% 
    .[, .SD, .SDcols = vars_outcome] %>% 
    .[, c(treatment_name) := NULL] %>% 
    na.omit
  
  model_1 <- data_1 %>% 
    as.data.table %>% 
    train_model(outcome, models='boosting', tuneLength = tuneLength)
  model_2 <- data_2 %>% 
    as.data.table %>% 
    train_model(outcome, models='boosting', tuneLength = tuneLength)
  
  ITEs <- cross_fitting_t_learner(
    data_outcomes, model_1, model_2,
    outcome_name = outcome, prediction_name='outcome_pred',
    treatment_name=treatment_name, outcome_val=treatment_vals[1]
    )
  
  results[[outcome]] <- list(
    ITEs = ITEs, model_1=model_1, data_1=data_1, model_2=model_2, data_2=data_2, change_=change_
  )
  
}
```


```{r, echo=FALSE}
for( outcome in outcomes ){
  print_model_results(
    outcome, 
    results[[outcome]]$model_1, 
    results[[outcome]]$data_1, 
    results[[outcome]]$model_2, 
    results[[outcome]]$data_2, 
    results[[outcome]]$change_
  )
  print_ates(
    outcome, 
    results[[outcome]]$ITEs, 
    treatment_vals
  )
  
}
```
